items.sentence: Tom\'s school day is divided into six periods.
Tom\'s wife remarried shortly after his death.
I had to wait twenty minutes for the next bus.
I have about three times as many books as Tom.
I have something personal to discuss with Tom.
I have something personal to discuss with you.
I don\'t think that I\'ll tell Tom about this.
My teacher told me to read as much as I could.
No matter what I do, she says I can do better.
Oh, I just remembered. Tom left you a message.
